articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: Mars is a 'winter wonderland' in this frosty (and stunning) image from space - Space.com
articles.description: The new image from Europe's Mars Express probe is a festive treat.
articles.content:
The wintery scene of ice over the southern hemisphere of Mars as seen by the European Space Agency's Mars Express spacecraft.  (Image credit: ESA/DLR/FU Berlin, CC BY-SA 3.0 IGO)
A newly released im… [+3970 chars]

articles.title: SpaceX wins Sentinel 6B radar satellite launch contract - TESLARATI
articles.description: SpaceX has won a contract to launch the joint US-European Sentinel 6B radar satellite as early as November 2025. Five years ago, NASA also chose SpaceX to launch Sentinel 6A, the first of two identical satellites designed to use radar altimeters to determine …
articles.content:
SpaceX has won a contract to launch the joint US-European Sentinel 6B radar satellite as early as November 2025.
